# Opening Project in VSCode

Open terminal and type:

cd C:\laragon\www\

The path C:\laragon\www\ contains all the project folders and files that are hosted within Laragon.

To open a project in VSCode:

cd project-name

After changing the current directory to the project folder, we can open VSCode:

code .
